```{r, results = "asis"}
plot_list <- c("Volcano raw P",
               "Volcano adjusted P",
               "MD raw P",
               "MD adjusted P")
src <- lapply(plot_list, function(plot) {
  plot <- deparse(plot)
  knitr::knit_expand(file = system.file("report_templates/glimma_xy_plot.Rmd",
                     package = "proteomicsDIA"))

})

res <- knitr::knit_child(text = unlist(src), quiet = TRUE, options = list(root.dir = getwd()))
cat(res, sep = "\n")
```
